name: Murne
appearance: Lean, scarred by old glass cuts, with a sandveil hood and goggles permanently ringed with pale dust. Teeth faintly greened by cullet tests.
character: Pragmatic and wry, with a superstition for storms and names spoken on the dunes. Counts friends by who shows up when the wind shifts.
traits: wears a luck-rope of fulgurite beads
never turns his back to the Expanse
talks to dunes like old friends
talents: can grade cullet by bite and sound
hears the edge of a glassstorm minutes early
dreams: Win a legal cullet share free of Syndicate strings
Find the storm-anchor that answers names
secrets: Recovered a star-metal harpoon from a wyrm breach and hid it under an abandoned rib stair
Sold cullet to both Syndicate and their rivals on the same night
